name: rizq-dev
description: Professional developer toolkit for the RIZQ App - understands the codebase architecture, patterns, and conventions
author: RIZQ App Team

agents.name: feature-builder
agents.description: Build complete features end-to-end: pages, components, hooks, database, and routes. Use when implementing new functionality.

agents.name: component-builder
agents.description: Create React components following the design system - shadcn/ui, Tailwind, Framer Motion animations, Islamic patterns.

agents.name: hook-builder
agents.description: Create custom hooks for data fetching (React Query + Neon), state management, and business logic.

agents.name: database-architect
agents.description: Design and implement database schemas, migrations, queries, and data access patterns for Neon PostgreSQL.

agents.name: ui-polish
agents.description: Refine UI/UX with animations, micro-interactions, accessibility, and design system consistency.

agents.name: debugger
agents.description: Debug issues by tracing through components, hooks, database queries, and auth flows.

skills.name: design-system
skills.description: Reference for colors, typography, spacing, animations, and Islamic patterns in the RIZQ design system

skills.name: component-patterns
skills.description: Standard patterns for components: props, variants, animations, composition

skills.name: data-patterns
skills.description: Patterns for React Query hooks, Neon database access, type mappings

skills.name: auth-patterns
skills.description: Authentication patterns: Better Auth, protected routes, user profiles

commands.name: new-feature
commands.description: Scaffold a new feature with all necessary files

commands.name: new-component
commands.description: Create a new component with proper structure
